bid(Bot) - Method in class auctionControl.AuctionProcess
 
bidBtnClicked() - Method in class auctionControl.AuctionProcess
When bid button is clicked, you have to check if you have the money, if yes, you are the highest bidder and the bidding price increases.

buy(long, Property) - Method in class users.Admin

buy(long, Property) - Method in class users.User
The user buy method is important because it adds to the users list of properties and decreases the balance by the price that the user paid.
